sounds: Behold the all permeating powers I draw from this gate!!
MWAAAHAHAAA!! NO ONE!! NO ONE CAN DEFEAT MEEE!!!
name: Energized Raging Mage
behaviour: Fights in close combat. Tries to escape when his health drops to red.
strategy: The Energized Raging Mage will continually spawn when they are killed as long as insufficient [[Yielothax]] have been killed. For this reason it is advised not to kill him and focus your efforts on the [[Yielothax]]es. {{JSpoiler|The [[achievement]] [[Mageslayer]] can be earned by killing him twice.}}
